isis.stitle: EC-30 ABS / ATC CONTROLLER - EC-30 CONFIGURABLE PARAMETERS

svcproc.title: EC-30 CONFIGURABLE PARAMETERS
svcproc.para: The EC-30 has various configurable function parameters that can be enabled to provide the user with additional or customized features. The default settings for these parameters are chosen by the vehicle OEM. The configurable features include serial communications message broadcasts, alternative lamp control, various I/O recognition, ABS control settings and others. To ensure that the unit you are working with has the correct default settings, use only the correct replacement part number. However, most of these settings can be altered using the Bendix ACom for Windows program. For further information, contact Bendix or refer to your local authorized Bendix dealer.
